Articles.Content:
I've managed to build a craft that can land & escape eve and should be able to return home.. exept the my final problem:

to get anything above eves orbit i had to use that 11000km mountain to land start from. sadly this brings me in an ugly orbit to aim for kerbin and i dont have enugh fuel to burn the inclination away.

is there a way to calculate a time for return without correcting the inclination..? try and error is really frustrating

i'll post the whole craft when i'm done .. i have 150 fuel and a nuclearengine in 110000m/11Ã‚Â° above eve - that must be possible?
